<content type="html">;用于学习编程的沉浸式体验环境，由新加坡国立大学计算机学院开发。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#sicp-in-javascript" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36836729" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;男子因运行 Tor 出口节点而被判犯有儿童色情罪</stitle>; <id>;https://lowendbox.com/blog/man-found-guilty-of-child-porn-because-he-ran-a-tor-exit-node-the-story-of-william-weber/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T17:04:50.605960Z</updated>; <link href="https://lowendbox.com/ blog/man-found-guilty-of-child-porn-because-he-ran-a-tor-exit-node-the-story-of-william-weber/"/>; <author>; <name>;h0ek</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=h0ek</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://lowendbox.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/ 07/william-tor.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;LowEndTalk 的长期成员 William Weber 因与在 TOR 网络上运营的儿童色情团伙有关而遭到奥地利政府的搜查。大量电脑、枪支和其他物品被没收，韦伯可能被指控传播和可能制作儿童色情制品。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#man-found-guilty-of-child-porn-because-he-ran-a-tor-exit-node" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36837273" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：我制作了一个连接到您的数据库的 MailChimp 替代方案</stitle>; <id>;https://cc.dev</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T17:00:50.607443Z</updated>; <link href="https://cc.dev"/>; <author>; <name>;kashnote</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=kashnote</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.cc.dev/static/images/db/postgres_db_type_logo.svg" style="width: 220px; height: 221px;" />;<br />;使用 SQL 连接数据库并直接定位受众。使用我们简单的工具和模板，以平常成本的一小部分发送高质量的营销电子邮件。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-i-made-a-mailchimp-alternative-that-c​​onnects-to-your-database" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36836596" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;针对 Ruby 开发者的 Elixir：三个最重要的区别</stitle>; <id>;https://phoenixonrails.com/blog/elixir-for-ruby-developers-the- Three-most-important-differences</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T16:00:50.608230Z</updated>; <link href=" https://phoenixonrails.com/blog/elixir-for-ruby-developers-the- Three-most-important-differences"/>; <author>; <name>;arrowsmith</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=arrowsmith</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://phoenixonrails.com/images/blog/red-potion.jpg" style="width: 2 20 像素；高度：147 像素；" />;<br />;Elixir 是一种函数式语言，在语法和代码结构上与 Ruby 不同。它不像 Ruby 那样有类和对象，而是使用模块和函数。 Elixir 也是不可变的，这意味着对象一旦创建就无法更改。此外，Elixir 是一种在 BEAM 虚拟机上运行的编译语言。它很大程度上基于 Erlang，也可以作为解释语言运行。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#elixir-for-ruby-developers-the- Three-most-important-differences" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36836258" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hacker news.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;范畴论的不变量解决了数学生态学中的问题 [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.maths.ed.ac.uk/~tl/genova/genova_talk.pdf</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T16:00:50.608995Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.maths.ed.ac. uk/~tl/genova/genova_talk.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;peanutcrisis</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=peanutcrisis</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;有限度量空间 A 的相似度矩阵是 n × n 矩阵 Z。随着距离从 0 增加到 Infini，A 的基数从 1 增加到 2。q 阶的最大多样性是 Z 的大小，最大化多样性的分布是 Z 上的权重，归一化为 1。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#an-invariant-from-category-theory-solves-a-problem-in-mathematical-ecology-pdf" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36836358" target=" _blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;观众填写基思·穆恩 (2016) 的夜晚</stitle>; <id>;https://www.loudersound.com/features/what-happened-the-night-an-audience-member-filled-in-for-keith-moon</id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T15:00:50.609748Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.loudersound.com/features/what-happened-the-night-an-audience-member-filled-in-for-keith-moon"/>; <author>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/TmVWRsZw2tkEH8vbrKnmkJ-320-80.jpg" style="width: 220px;身高：124px;" />;<br />;1973 年 11 月 20 日，Keith Moon 因药物而丧失行为能力后，19 岁的 Scott Halpin 与 The Who 一起打鼓。Halpin 的表演给乐队和观众留下了深刻的印象。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-night-an-audience-member-filled-in-for-keith-moon-2016" target="_blank">; [摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36835735" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;一路向下的接口</stitle>; <id>;https://jjain.substack.com/p/interfaces-all- the-way-down</id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T16:00:50.610602Z</更新>; <link href="https://jjain.substack.com/p/interfaces-all-the-way-down"/>; <作者>; <name>;jinay</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jinay</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img s rc="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F50cdb57b-fb08-4aaf-a11e-cf3ff92da9df_912x548。 png" 样式="宽度:220px; height: 133px;" />;<br />;软件工程成功的关键是要非常熟练地设计界面。随着工程师在职业生涯中不断进步，他们需要负责更大、更复杂的界面。高质量的界面会带来欣赏、信任和完成更大任务的机会。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#interfaces-all-the-way-down" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator .com/item?id=36836433" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;不以 .gov 结尾的政府网址</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/GSA/govt-urls</id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T 17:00:50.611344Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/GSA/govt-urls"/>; <author>; <name>;notmysql_</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=notmysql_</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/54ed074dedf72f8393de6ec 4e562dc158cabc4409e86da5d3b41729e216ba7b2/GSA/govt-urls" style="宽度：220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;此存储库包含不属于 .gov 和 .mil 域的公共政府管理域的列表。欢迎更新和添加。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#government-urls-that-don-t-end-in-gov" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=3 6836649" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;化石显示哺乳动物将牙齿沉入恐龙</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/science/2023/jul/18/mesozoic-fossil-dinosaur-mammal-fight</id>; <已更新>;2023-07-23T16：00：50.612082Z </已更新>; <link href="https://www.theguardian.com/science/2023/jul/18/mesozoic-fossil-dinosaur-mammal-fight"/>; <作者>; <名称>;胡克</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Hooke</uri>; </作者>; <内容type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/5eb35cb456f7ba63ad0fabbbc52c148dbe6a1b42/0_0_4000_3150/master/4000.jpg?width=445&dpr=1&s=none" style="宽度：220px;高度：174px;" />;<br />;一块新发现的化石表明，有时小型哺乳动物能够反击恐龙。这块拥有 1.25 亿年历史的化石显示，一种小型哺乳动物的牙齿陷入了喙状恐龙的肋骨中。这一发现挑战了早期哺乳动物只是恐龙猎物的观点。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#fossil-shows-mammal-sinking-teeth-into -dinosaur" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36832293" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Show HN：我为极简主义者和我自己制作了一个可定制的 iOS 浏览器</stitle>; <id >;https://apps.apple.com/us/app/quiche-browser/id1668363952</id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T13:00:50.612833Z</更新>; <link href="https://apps.apple.com/us/app/quiche-browser/id1668363952"/>; <作者>; <名称>;nckh</名称>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=nckh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://is1-ssl.mzstatic.com/image/thumb/Purple126/v4/aa/5b/6c/aa5b6cdf-5397-6c14-76d4-d23d46f7e34c/AppIcon-1x_U007 ephone-0-0-0-0-0-85-220.png/1200x630wa.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;最可定制的浏览器，允许用户个性化工具栏、弹出菜单、地址栏等。它还提供增强的选项卡管理并优先考虑用户隐私。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-i-made-a-customized-ios-browser-for-minimalists-and-myself" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.y Combinator.com/item?id=36834732" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;混合 Swift 和 C++</stitle>; <id>;https://www.swift.org/documentation/cxx-interop/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T15 :00:50.613601Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.swift.org/documentation/cxx-interop/"/>; <作者>; <name>;oumua_don17</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=oumua_don17</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.swift.org/apple-touch-icon-180x1 80.png"样式="宽度:220px; height: 221px;" />;<br />;本文档是描述如何混合 Swift 和 C++ 的参考指南。它提供了示例，展示了如何在 Swift 中使用 C++ API 以及如何在 C++ 中使用 Swift API。C++ 互操作性是即将发布的 Swift 5.9 版本中的一项新功能。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#mixing-swift-and-c" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36835412" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;多亏了这个博客，我找到了一份 IT 工作</stitle>; <id>;https://giuliomagnifico.blog/misc/2023/07/22/I -found-a-IT-job-thanks-to-this-blog.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T07:00:50.614405Z</更新>; <link href="https://giuliomagnifico.blog/misc/2023/07/22/I-found-a-IT-job-thanks-to-this-blog.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;giuliomagnifico</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=giuliomagnifico</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://giuliomagnifico.blog/_images/2023/IT-jobs-blog/IMG_9768.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;一家安全公司在阅读了作者的博文后向作者提供了一份工作。作者接受了这份工作，现在担任 DevOps 或系统管理员，使用 Grafana 和 Prometheus 构建数据中心并创建监控系统。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i-found-an-it-job-thanks-to-this-blog" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36833089" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;魔法王国的落魄</stitle>; <id>;https://www.gutenberg.org/files/8086/8086-h /8086-h.htm</id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T11:00:50.615152Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.gutenberg.org/files/8086/8086-h/8086-h.htm"/>; <作者>; <name>;keepamovin</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ke epamovin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;《魔法王国的落魄》是一个引人入胜的科幻故事，故事发生在华特·迪士尼统治世界、死亡已被治愈的未来。主角努力保护魔法王国最初的人类面貌，对抗地球的后人类继承者。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#down-and-out-in-the-magic-kingdom-2003" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36833951" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;电解电容器：概述、拆解和实验 [视频]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MAP-VA1m-A4</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T13:00:50.616631Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MAP-VA1m-A4"/>; <author>; <name>;daneel_w</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=daneel_w</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<iframe src="//www.youtube.com/embed/MAP-VA1m-A4"frameborder="0"allowfullscreen loading="lazy">;</iframe>; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/# electrolytic-capacitors- Overview-teardown-and-experiments-video" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; https://stemformulas.com/formulas/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T11:00:50.617406Z</updated>; <link href="https://stemformulas.com/formulas/"/>; <author>; <name>;surprisetalk</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=surprisetalk</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章包含与向量微积分和矩阵乘法相关的数学方程。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#stem-formulas" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36817851" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Le Cun：高通与 Meta 合作在移动设备上运行 Llama-2</stitle>; <id>;https://twitter.com/ylecun/status/1683138295155372032</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T16:00:50.619680Z</updated>; <link href="https://twitter.com/ylecun/status/168313829 5155372032"/>; <author>; <name>;birriel</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=birriel</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;出了点问题，但不要担心 - 让我们再试一次。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#lecun-qualcomm-working-with-meta-to-run-llama-2-on-mobile-devices" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36836538" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;每个 IT 人员需要了解的 OpenBSD 知识 (2021)</stitle>; <id>;https://nxdomain.no/~peter/what_every_it_person_needs_to_know_about_openbsd.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T08:00:50.620433Z</updated>; < link href="https://nxdomain.no/~peter/what_every_it_person_needs_to_know_about_openbsd.html"/>; <author>; <name>;todsacerdoti</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://nxdomain.no/~peter/blogpix/tshirt-4。 gif"样式="宽度：220px；高度：192px；" />;<br />;OpenBSD 是一个免费且安全的操作系统，专注于正确且安全的代码。它率先使用了强加密技术，并以其代码审计实践而闻名。 OpenBSD 广泛应用于以网络为中心的角色，并且是多种广泛使用的软件组件的来源。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#what-every-it-person-needs-to-know-about-openbsd-2021" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36833393" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;丰田一直在开发续航里程为 745 英里的电动汽车固态电池</stitle>; <id>;https://www.topspeed.com/toyota-745-mile-solid-state-battery/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T10:00:50.621238Z</updated>; <link href="https://www .topspeed.com/toyota-745-mile-solid-state-battery/"/>; <作者>; <name>;achow</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=achow</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static1.topspeedimages.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/toyota-bz4x-2023 -1600-1e-fotor-20230720175837.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;丰田开发了一款用于电动汽车的固态电池，续航里程为 745 英里，充电时间为 10 分钟，给行业带来了革命性的变化。这一突破表明丰田对后 ICE 未来的态度发生了转变。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#toyota-has-been-developmenting-a-solid-state-battery-for-evs-with-a-range-of-745mi" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36833836" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </条目>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;中世纪餐桌礼仪：最梅西神话？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.medievalists.net/2023/06/medieval-table-manners/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T10:00:50.622000Z</updated>; <link href ="https://www.medievalists.net/2023/06/medieval-table-manners/"/>; <author>; <name>;BerislavLopac</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=BerislavLopac</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.medievalists.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/medieval-table-礼仪.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：126px；" />;<br />;中世纪人们的餐桌礼仪和期望与现代社会相似。他们饭前洗手、餐巾纸并重视一张布置良好的餐桌。他们应该有尊严地吃饭，不要含着食物说话，并避免凌乱的饮食习惯。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#medieval-table-manners-the-messiest-myth" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36811460" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;德意志银行“功能失调”的 IT 部门（2018 年）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.efinancialcareers.co.uk/news/2018/04/technology-at-deutsche-bank</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T11:00:50.624599Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.efinancial Careers.co.uk/news/2018/04/technology-at-deutsche-bank"/>; <author>; <name>;Cwizard</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Cwizard</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.filestackcontent.com/output=format:webp/resize=width:730,height:432,fit:crop/ jbmbWG2TRzaaoQM66rur?cache=true" style="宽度：220px；高度：131px；" />;<br />;德意志银行首席运营官金·哈蒙兹(Kim Hammonds)在将银行描述为“极其复杂”且“功能失调”的工作场所后即将离开该银行。她的主要任务是简化银行的操作系统，但两年半后，德意志银行仍然拥有 32 个不同的操作系统。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#deutsche-bank-s-dysfunction-it-division-2018" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36833915" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;制药商正在“扔掉厨房水槽”来阻止医疗保险价格谈判</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nytimes.com/2023/07/23/us/politics/medicare-drug-price-negotiations-lawsuits.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T16:00:50.625410 Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.nytimes.com/2023/07/23/us/politics/medicare-drug-price-negotiations-lawsuits.html"/>; <作者>; <name>;SeanBoocock</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=SeanBoocock</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static01.nyt.com /images/2023/07/17/multimedia/00dc-drugprices-01-tlkq/00dc-drugprices-01-tlkq-articleLarge.jpg?quality=75&auto=webp&disable=upscale" style="宽度：220 像素；高度：147 像素；" />;<br />;正当谈判即将开始之际，制药行业正在对授权医疗保险谈判药品价格的法律发起广泛的攻击。多家制药公司和行业团体已提起诉讼，声称药品定价条款违宪。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#drugmakers-are-throwing-the-kitchen-sink-to-halt-medicare-price-negotiations" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36836530" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml： base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;MOVEit 人数接近 400 个组织、超过 2000 万个人</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theregister.com/2023/07/20/moveit_victim_count/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T14:00:50.626220Z</updated>; <link href ="https://www.theregister.com/2023/07/20/moveit_victim_count/"/>; <author>; <name>;LinuxBender</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=LinuxBender</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://regmedia.co.uk/2016/07/19/data_breach_shutterstock.jpg" style="width: 2 20 像素；高度：146 像素；" />;<br />;随着大规模供应链攻击的影响进入第七周，与 MOVEit 文件传输黑客攻击相关的受害者数量和成本继续攀升。截至今天，受影响的组织数量已接近 400 个，其中包括一些非常知名的组织。据网络安全机构 Emsisoft 称，截至 7 月 19 日，已有 383 个组织和超过 2000 万人受到威胁。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#moveit-body-count-closes-in-on-400-orgs-20m-individuals" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36835293" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;riscv64 现已成为官方 Debian 架构（正在进行重启）</stitle>; <id>;https://lists.debian.org/debian-riscv/2023/07/msg00053.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T13:00:50.627750Z</updated>; < link href="https://lists.debian.org/debian-riscv/2023/07/msg00053.html"/>; <author>; <name>;pabs3</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pabs3</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;回复：<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#riscv64-is-now-an-of ficial-debian-architecture-rebootstrap-in-progress" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36834701" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
